title: Can we put a cap on lifesteal?
body:
You talk so much about how spellvamp was just "toxic," yet ADCs can just stack lifesteal and 1v3 and win if they have a hurricane -- even if they just stand there not moving. If you ask me, the ability to right click and become more of a drain tank than Vlad EVER was with WOTA is more toxic than an AP champ healing a tiny bit when they cast.

So, cap lifesteal. Make it only able to heal up to a certain amount of health per shot, or put a hard cap on the conversion ratio.

replies.body: yet adcs dont have tank stats and are vulnerable
Life steal is fine, but don't tell me adcs are squishy with {{item:3071}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3156}}
Tell that to them healing for 1000+ every 2 seconds. >.>
They can also die within that 2 seconds because they have no armor to keep them alive.
If they're not CCd the entire time, no, they will absolutely not die.

no, you don't need CC even, just Damage. send a fizz/zed or almost any other assassin or burst control mage and rarely will the adc be able to get more than one auto off before they randomly disappear under an array of abilities.

14/2 Renekton, 320ish AD. I can instagib their mid laner and top, but Graves has a shield from BT and survives my stun, then out-sustains my damage and wins.

12/0 Lulu mid, ~600 AP with Luden's and Lichbane. I can literally one shot anyone on their team, but their Jinx has a Maw, survives my E+Q, then comes out of polymorph and just kills me as I use my abilities all over again.

Full AD Illaoi with 350 AD and a Triforce + Sterak's, get a 6-man ult and 3 hits of my W, Ashe survives with ~40% HP and I die. Rest of her team didn't even touch me.

I really don't see them dying to anything that isn't a fucking literal nuke. If you don't CC spam them or literally one shot them, you lose. Period.

i could keep explaining to you how, but you won't listen, in the end it's you... considering ADC's aren't even the strongest spots, the only thing you've shown is that you get kited... along with the graves one being a bad example considering he gets bonus armor off his E

By the time one tentacle gets through the animation an adc would get around 2 maybe 3 autos off and then I'm sure you got kited from there on...

You described a lategame renekton whose damage falls off, lulu mid who nerfed out the wazoo, besides a lulu is never able to 1shot an adc not mentioning the fact that Maw itself is a strong item on it's own.

Illaoi, really? are you actually trying to say you're going to oneshot an adc with tri/steraks. Not even going to explain the illaoi one.

Show me the renek one vs graves. besides graves being one of the beefiest adcs. adding to his armor with his E(which stacks up to 4 times), I doubt he ever just builds pure damage without some bulk in it. I bet he also along with his E stacks, had a PD which gives 12% damage reduction from the last person he hit. That, anddddd I'm sure he also built Deaths Dance which turns another 15% of damage into a slow bleed as well instead of just instant damage.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Life_steal

Huh, well look at that. Must have changed some time this season. For all prior seasons the cap was 40%. The only champ that could attain a greater % was Sion with his Ult.
To my knowledge there hasn't been a cap since launch. Just harder to obtain back then.
Why would you cap lifesteal? It's incredibly easy to counter and anyone getting more than 30% is wasting gold.
Because it eliminates the one weakness that ADCs have, which is their squishiness.

What? Since when does life steal suddenly not make them squishy?
they still have
-no resistances
-low base health
-low overall health 
and are incredibly vulnerable to anyone who understands how to actually kill them.

Because, short of spamming CC on them, you literally can't kill them -- even if you have a Mortal Reminder. They're supposed to be weak to people jumping on them, but they just aren't with how much lifesteal is around.

One time, I was playing Illaoi when she was still newish. I had ~350 AD, a Triforce, and a Sterak's to boost the damage on that. I ulted an Ashe's entire team, plus her spirit, having a total of 6 tentacles. She survived three hits of my W and all the tentacles because of all her lifesteal, killed me (had ~40% health at this point), and then went on to kill two more people before she died.

So, ADCs are a bit broken right now. Fervor, lifesteal and all the armor pen on items just makes them absurd.
